body_html:
I am using OpenMPI 2.1.1 and getting the following error:

./third_party/mpi/mpi.h:2704:41: fatal error: openmpi/ompi/mpi/cxx/mpicxx.h: No such file or directory

It seems like OpenMPI also needs the mpicxx.h header file but this is only generated with MVAPICH.
